column4: I'm currently on a LiveCD, due to my regular Ubuntu partition not working -- how would I go ahead and *fix* the regular one now?
I'm currently on a LiveCD, due to my regular Ubuntu partition not working -- how would I go ahead and *fix* the regular one now?
not working in what manner.. it doesnt boot?
Correct. :) It actually doesn't find the harddrive. http://paste.ubuntu.com/602816/ in particular.
